title: Hobos Restaurant and Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu includes vegan food, and the chef/owner will sometimes make vegan items which are not on the menu - ask about it. Uses local farmers market produce. Kitchenware is cleaned before preparing vegan items. Try the veg meatloaf sandwich made from cracked wheat, tvp, and vegannaise. Pleasant atmosphere.
